description: Schema definition for deleting a user. Admin-only endpoint.

headers.name: x-auth-token
headers.description: The admin user's JWT for authentication.

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.description: The ID of the user to delete.

msg.description: A success message confirming the deletion.

401_Unauthorized.description: Returned if the x-auth-token is missing or invalid.

403_Forbidden.description: Returned if the authenticated user is not an admin.

404_NotFound.description: Returned if no user is found with the given ID.
